# Installation

Soon, installers will be available for all major platforms. Right now, Formality-Core can only be installed through npm. Install npm following [this guide](https://www.npmjs.com/get-npm). Then, go to the command-line and simply type:

```
npm i -g formality-core
```

This should install it. In order to test if it worked, type:

```
fmc
```

If you see our command-line instructions, Formality-Core has been successfully installed in your system. If you have any problem during this process, please [open an issue](https://github.com/moonad/Formality/issues).
